title: Bonus Episode: We've Gravely Lost The Plot...
description:
Domonique is joined by his friend, senior writer at Andscape David Dennis Jr., to give you a sad sandwich. They cover Ime Udoka, Brett Favre, and more. After that, Andscape culture host and producer Sheila Matthews joins the show to teach Dom a thing or two about music, pop culture, and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
